main event: On February 29, 1956, multiple witnesses observed bright, unidentified flying objects in the sky over Buffalo, New York.
interesting points: Witnesses described the object as having a circular shape and changing colors from bright to dim,Some witnesses reported seeing the object moving rapidly before stopping,Two other individuals confirmed sightings from different locations,One witness observed multiple objects over the course of several hours,The incident involved military personnel and local civilians including an accountant and a high school student.
sighted object: bright, circular objects that changed colors
witness description: witnesses included military personnel, an accountant, and a high school student
